text: Agreed. Not just raises, but the kind of work they want to be spending their time on.

elements.text: Agreed. Not just raises, but the kind of work they want to be spending their time on.

text:
Hello Superpath community!

We have a new "Dear Superpath" question. This is a way for folks to ask anonymous questions. 

Career stage: mid (4-7 years of experience)

"Hello everyone, need your help & inputs :pray:

I have an opportunity to join an early-stage startup (employee #1 in marketing) with ~ 10 member team and ~ $1 Mn ARR. They have raised $1 Mn funding but do not want to raise any funds and want to grow sustainably.

I have 5 years of experience in marketing with 1 year of experience in SaaS. I'm evaluating if I should accept this opportunity as it looks interesting to me, but I have some doubts:

:point_right: They want to grow 5x in the next 3 years (mostly organic) but their product doesn't have relevant search queries. The growth so far has been via community, word of mouth, etc.
- Is it possible to scale 5x with no paid marketing i.e via Referral, Community, etc? (else, I might risk my job due to performance issues).

Their ACV is ~$600 and they are in dev tools.

Appreciate your valuable time and inputs :pray:"
